summary: Adds OlfvarCompanion.esp. Found at The Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
This mod, my first one that I\'ve uploaded to the Skyrim Nexus, adds a companion named \'Olfvar\', who resides at The Sleeping Giant Inn located in Riverwood.

Olfvar is equipped with Dragonplate Armour, which cannot be removed from him, and a Daedric Greatsword, which is swappable with other weapons. He is like any other companion and you can store your items, tell him to wait here, or instruct him to go home. He\'s quite powerful, and is extremely useful for tanking. He has a default bow, which I never put on him but for some reason he draws sometimes, but you can always store another bow into his inventory, unless you just want to leave him like that.

Olfvar has the normal dialogue options, and should be at The Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood, sitting on a chair near where the bards usually sing. He may, or may not be overpowered, but he does have a great amount of health. Still, he\'s useful with good armour and weapons.

Installination Instructions:

Install:
Extract OlfvarCompanion.esp to your Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data folder. Launch Skyrim, click \'Data Files\', and check \'OlfvarCompanion.esp\'. It should already be checked for you anyway, but it\'s worth looking at.

Uninstall:
Delete the ESP file you extracted to your Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data folder, and it should be deleted.

If you have any questions, or bugs are showing up with the mod, please comment or send me a message, and I\'ll get to fixing it.
Endorse my mod, please :)/

Credits:
Bethesda Softworks - for producing the game \'Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim\'
Steam - the gaming engine.
Creation Kit - Skyrim\'s mod creation program.
And me, ozzy561, for assembling the mod.
VIEW, DOWNLOAD, ENDORSE.
